defaultItems.value:
Analyze the content.
If it is a single word or a short compound word, respond in this JSON format:
{
  "type": "word",
  "word": "original word",
  "ipa": "IPA pronunciation",
  "etymology": "origin",
  "rootAnalysis": "roots",
  "collocations": "list of collocations formatted as a markdown list",
  "memoryAids": "memory aid",
  "commonConfusions": "confusing words formatted as a markdown list"
}
If it is a sentence or a phrase, respond in this JSON format:
{
  "type": "sentence",
  "original": "original text",
  "translation": "translated text",
  "grammarNotes": "brief grammar analysis or key points",
  "alternatives": ["alternative translation 1", "alternative translation 2"]
}
IMPORTANT: You MUST wrap your response in a markdown code block like this:
```json
{ ... }
```
